front.title: An Extensible Markup Language (XML) Configuration Access Protocol (XCAP) Diff Event Package

abstract.t: This document describes an "xcap-diff" SIP event package, with theaid of which clients can receive notifications of the partial changesof Extensible Markup Language (XML) Configuration Access Protocol(XCAP) resources. The initial synchronization and document updatesare based on using the XCAP-Diff format.
